        <E extends Accessible> E detail(String id,
                                Class<E> cls)
                         throws ItemNotFound
        Fetch an item, as a user. This only provides access control.
        Parameters:
        id - the item id
        cls - the item's class
        Returns:
        the given framed vertex
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound

      • createLink

        Link createLink(String targetId1,
                String targetId2,
                List<String> bodies,
                Bundle bundle,
                Collection<Accessor> accessibleTo,
                Optional<String> logMessage)
         throws ItemNotFound,
                ValidationError,
                PermissionDenied
        Create a link between two items.
        Parameters:
        targetId1 - the identifier of a Accessible target of this Annotation
        targetId2 - the identifier of a Annotator source of this Annotation
        bundle - the annotation itself
        Returns:
        a new link
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        ValidationError
        PermissionDenied

      • createAccessPointLink

        Link createAccessPointLink(String targetId1,
                           String targetId2,
                           String descriptionId,
                           String bodyName,
                           AccessPointType bodyType,
                           Bundle bundle,
                           Collection<Accessor> accessibleTo,
                           Optional<String> logMessage)
                    throws ItemNotFound,
                           ValidationError,
                           PermissionDenied
        Create a link between two items, along with an access point on the given description.
        Parameters:
        targetId1 - the identifier of a Accessible target of this Annotation
        targetId2 - the identifier of a Annotator source of this Annotation
        bundle - the annotation itself
        Returns:
        a new link
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        ValidationError
        PermissionDenied

      • createAnnotation

        Annotation createAnnotation(String id,
                            String did,
                            Bundle bundle,
                            Collection<Accessor> accessibleTo,
                            Optional<String> logMessage)
                     throws PermissionDenied,
                            AccessDenied,
                            ValidationError,
                            ItemNotFound
        Create an annotation for a dependent node of an item. The entity and the dependent item can be the same.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the Accessible this annotation is attached to, as a target
        did - the identifier of the dependent item
        bundle - the annotation itself
        accessibleTo - users or groups who can access this annotation
        Returns:
        the created annotation
        Throws:
        PermissionDenied
        AccessDenied
        ValidationError
        ItemNotFound

        Returns:
        the promotable item
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        PermissionDenied
        Api.NotPromotableError
